Sequence Information.Source: Treponema pallidum, bacteriocin, Gram-negative bacteria, prokaryotes

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (44.44%) tomicrobiota predicted P15sor AP2848 (ecPis-3). GRAVY:  -0.49; Mol Wt: 2655.246; Mol formula:  C117H209N39O28S1; Mol Ex Coeff: 0;Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 9723HM (MIC 12 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 10148 (MIC 24.1–48.2 uM), and M. smegmatis MC 155 (MIC 1.5–3.0 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Houston S, Schovanek E, Conway KME, Mustafa S, Gomez A, Ramaswamy R, Haimour A, Boulanger MJ, Reynolds LA, Cameron CE.2022
Literature Information.Title: Identification and Functional Characterization of Peptides With Antimicrobial Activity From the Syphilis Spirochete, Treponema pallidum
